summary: Multiple animals and insects experience the sleazier side of show business while working on a variety show.
cast: Danny Mulheron|Donna Akersten|Stuart Devenie|Mark Hadlow|Ross Jolly|Brian Sergent|Peter Vere-Jones|Mark Wright|Jay Snowfield|Doug Wren
keywords: gross out comedy|puppet|black comedy|electronic music score|troubled production
title: El delirante mundo de los Feebles
